amendatorysection.catchline: Television set; equipping motor vehicle with screen visible to driver; unlawful; penalty.
amendatorysection.para: It shall be unlawful to operate upon any public highway in this state a motor vehicle which is equipped with or in which is located a television set so placed that the viewing screen is visible to the driver while operating such vehicle. Any person violating this section shall be guilty of a Class V misdemeanor.
